title: Japan: today and tomorrow
brief_description: Introducing Japan and showing the close relationship with Australia, which has developed over the last decade. Goods and industrial know-how are traded between the two countries - capital from Japan is used to develop our mineral resources while we supply her people with raw materials and food in ever increasing quantities.
